text: Sardar Ayaz Sadiq (; born 17 October 1954) is a Pakistani politician. He has been a member of the National Assembly of Pakistan since August 2018. He was a member of the National Assembly from 2002 to May 2018. He was the 19th Speaker of the National Assembly of Pakistan from June 2013 to August 2015 and again from November 2015 to August 2018. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1954 births Category:Speakers of the National Assembly of Pakistan
title: Ayaz Sadiq
